title: Lowe's Father's Day sale 2021: deals on tools, grills, appliances and more
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Get dad a last-minute gift from Lowe's today
article: Father's Day is just around the corner (Sunday, June 20, to be exact), and if you're looking for a last-minute gift for dad, Lowe's has you covered. The Lowe's Father's Day sale includes fantastic deals on tools, lawnmowers, grills, smart home devices, and so much more.

To help you sort through all the offers, we've rounded up the best Father's Day sales below as well as our hand-picked stand-out deals for dads. If you're in a rush, at the top of the page, you'll also find a summarized list of today's highlights along with links to the relevant content. Some highlighted offers from Lowe's Father's Day sale include up to 30% off tools and accessories, $200 off Weber SmokeFire grills, up to 25% off outdoor equipment, and up to 50% off smart home products. Shop more deals from Lowe's Father's Day sale below, and keep in mind, time is running out to grab a gift for dad, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.
